price: 18. Sakydamas: „Suteik man Allaho vergus (t. y. Israelio (Izrealio) Vaikus). Iš tiesų, aš esu tau Pasiuntinys, vertas pasitikėjimo.
arabic: أَنۡ أَدُّوٓاْ إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: an addū ilayya ʿibāda al-lahi innī lakum rasūlun amīnun
